content: *tired of limp loofas that don t live up to their promise of an invigorating scrub our textured washcloth is just the thing when you want something great for smoothing those toes or scrubbing the spine lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # bk4k-0605002 skill level easy level 2 a lion® cotton article #760 1 ball and b 9 in 23 cm nylon net fabric in the color of your choice cut into 3/4 in 2 cm wide strips *this is used as the second yarn in the pattern * special stitches fpdc bpdc work using using one strand of a and one of b together knit version rub-a-dub-a-scrub invigorating washcloth knit 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rub-a-dub-a-scrub-invigorating-washcloth-knit
